translated: The branch of the maṇḍala of the single speech

original: bsam gyis mi khyab kun tu grags //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab kun tu grags //
translated: Is renowned in all inconceivable ways.

original: sgra dang ming tshig so sor gsal //
analyzed: sgra dang ming tshig so sor gsal //
translated: Sound, names, and words are individually clear.

original: ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas gsungs //
analyzed: ljags kyi dbang po bkram nas gsungs //
translated: The organ of the tongue is spread out and speaks.

original: thar dang ma thar gnyi ga brjod //
analyzed: thar dang ma thar gnyi ga brjod //
translated: Both liberation and nonliberation are expressed.

original: nges pa kho na yang dag tu //
analyzed: nges pa kho na yang dag tu //
translated: The definitive and authentic

original: de bzhin nyid kyis yong ma gsungs //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyis yong ma gsungs //
translated: Is not spoken of by suchness.

original: sna yi dbang po'i dkyil 'khor du //
analyzed: sna yi dbang po'i dkyil 'khor du //
translated: In the maṇḍala of the organ of the nose,

original: tram gi yig 'bru gsal bsgoms nas //
analyzed: tram gi yig 'bru gsal bsgoms nas //
translated: Meditate on the clear syllable tram.

original: dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu dus bzhi yi //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu dus bzhi yi //
translated: The maṇḍala of the ten directions and four times

original: mtha' yas bsam gyis mi khyab ste //
analyzed: mtha' yas bsam gyis mi khyab ste //
translated: Is infinite and inconceivable.

original: tram yang bsam pas 'od 'phro 'bar //🔽phyogs dus dkyil 'khor ma lus thos //
analyzed: tram yang bsam pas 'od 'phro 'bar // phyogs dus dkyil 'khor ma lus thos //
translated: Tram also radiates and blazes with light.🔽All maṇḍalas of the directions and times are heard.

original: 'gro drug 'khor ba'i gnas kyang thos //
analyzed: 'gro drug 'khor ba'i gnas kyang thos //
translated: The abodes of the six migrating beings in saṃsāra are also heard.

original: sgra yang thos pa gnyis med pa'o //
analyzed: sgra yang thos pa gnyis med pa'o //
translated: Sound is also nondual with hearing.

original: de bzhin dri dang ro reg rnams //
analyzed: de bzhin dri dang ro reg rnams //
translated: Likewise, smell, taste, and touch

original: so so'i mtshan nyid gsal bsgoms nas //
analyzed: so so'i mtshan nyid gsal bsgoms nas //
translated: are clearly contemplated in their individual characteristics.

original: yig 'bru'i snying po de bzhin dgod //
analyzed: yig 'bru'i snying po de bzhin dgod //
translated: The essence of the seed syllable is likewise placed.🔽The entire maṇḍala of buddhas

original: sangs @435a *// rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus dang // 'gro drug ma lus thams cad kun //
analyzed: sangs @435a *// rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus dang // 'gro drug ma lus thams cad kun //
translated: and all six classes of migrating beings

original: chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis rol //
analyzed: chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis rol //
translated: are enjoyed in a nonattached manner.

original: dri la sogs pa bde mchog gis //
analyzed: dri la sogs pa bde mchog gis //
translated: The supreme bliss of smell and so on

original: kun la tshim par yang dag mchog /🔽'gro drug ma lus thams cad la //
analyzed: kun la tshim par yang dag mchog / 'gro drug ma lus thams cad la //
translated: is the perfect satisfaction of all.

original: ji ltar 'tsham pa'i don yang byed //
analyzed: ji ltar 'tsham pa'i don yang byed //
translated: The purpose is to benefit all six classes of migrating beings.

original: thabs mkhas thugs rjes de ltar ston //
analyzed: thabs mkhas thugs rjes de ltar ston //
translated: The skillful method is taught in that way.

original: de bzhin rigs dang rdo rje'i rigs //
analyzed: de bzhin rigs dang rdo rje'i rigs //
translated: Likewise, the buddha family and the vajra family

original: ma chags la sogs shes rab ldan //
analyzed: ma chags la sogs shes rab ldan //
translated: are endowed with nonattachment and so on and wisdom.

original: gtso bo lnga dang gtso mo lnga //
analyzed: gtso bo lnga dang gtso mo lnga //
translated: The five principals and the five principal consorts

original: thabs dang shes rab ldan bsgoms te //🔽chom bu gcig gam yang na gsum //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab ldan bsgoms te // chom bu gcig gam yang na gsum //
translated: are contemplated as being endowed with method and wisdom.🔽One should contemplate the maṇḍala of one, three,

original: lnga yi dkyil 'khor rab bsgoms te //
analyzed: lnga yi dkyil 'khor rab bsgoms te //
translated: or five heroes.

original: thabs dang shes rab phan tshun du; ;lha gsal 'od 'phro bstims byas te //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab phan tshun du; ;lha gsal 'od 'phro bstims byas te //
translated: The deity, clear and radiating light,

original: dkyil 'khor 'od zer 'bar bar bsgom //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor 'od zer 'bar bar bsgom //
translated: dissolves into the blazing light of the mandala.

original: ting 'dzin shin tu gsal gyur nas //
analyzed: ting 'dzin shin tu gsal gyur nas //
translated: When the samādhi becomes very clear,

original: bdag dang phyogs bcu dbyer med par //
analyzed: bdag dang phyogs bcu dbyer med par //
translated: one’s own body and the ten directions

original: gnyis su med par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: gnyis su med par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: are meditated on as nondual.

original: de nas thabs dang shes rab gnyis //
analyzed: de nas thabs dang shes rab gnyis //
translated: Then, the method and wisdom

original: lta spyod ya char ma gyur par //
analyzed: lta spyod ya char ma gyur par //
translated: should not be separated in view and conduct.
